basics.name: Michael Jantz
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Results-driven developer with 12+ years of experience capable of bringing a programming background and engineering mindset to a software engineering position.

work.position: Software Engineer, Avis Budget Group, Tulsa, Oklahoma
work.summary: Avis Budget Group is a leading global provider of mobility solutions, operating three of the most recognized brands in the vehicle rental industry through Avis, Budget and Zipcar. Avis Budget Group and its licensees operate in approximately 180 countries throughout the world.
highlights: Wrote and maintained web apps and services supporting the Finance and Reporting group using ASP.NET and C#, Bootstrap, JQuery, and SQL Server
Updated service packs, IIS integrations, and disk partitions, and performed troubleshooting on production server
Migrated web services from WCF to Web API
Implemented and maintained Git source control system
Migrated applications from .NET Framework to .NET Core/.NET

Wrote a service to schedule jobs that integrates with the majority of the deparment's applications, automating inter-departmental communication, rental contract reliability, and assisting in day-to-day rental operations at 3500+ rental locations
Lead the migration of applications from HTML, CSS, and jQuery to Blazor WebAssembly SPA framework
Championed the effort to procure funding for modern integrated development environments with appropriate business licenses, admin rights, new development machines, and cloud hosting
Lead the initiative to migrate from on-premises production server to Amazon Web Services, including CI/CD pipelines and repository hosting

work.position: Software Engineer, TMA Systems Inc, Tulsa, Oklahoma
work.summary: TMA Systems provides its clients with the most technologically advanced maintenance management software available based on input from more than 1,400 clients who maintain in excess of 45,000 facilities, representing 3.2 billion square feet of space.
highlights: Worked through three major product cycles in a .NET based web application using ASP.NET and C# with Telerik controls, on a SQL Server 2012 database
Created new modules and pages for products
Wrote reports in SSRS for clients

work.position: Electrical Engineer, FlightSafety International, Broken Arrow, Oklahoma
highlights: Gathered audio flight test data and generated a series of graphs to test simulation accuracy against
Simulated the communications systems, cockpit, and environmental sounds for various aircraft in C++ and integrated aircraft control systems into these simulations via Fortran

Traveled to onsite installation locations in order to tune the flight recording equipment, assist customer with creating the most accurate flight experience possible, and fine tune the audio characteristics in a live setting for FAA Level D certification

education.studyType: Bachelor of Science, magna cum laud in Computer Science

skills.name: Soft Skills
keywords: Works well with customers and customer expectations
Tolerant and flexible in different situations
